rmp
Class JxtaReliableEvent

java.lang.Object
  rmp.JxtaReliableEvent
public class JxtaReliableEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes

Description:
Container of the JxtaReliableEvent events, generated by the sending - receiving action of the channel

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Company: JXTA ORG

Field Summary
 int action
          It points out whether this event is a Receive [set to RECEIVE] or a Send [set to SEND] event.
 java.lang.String channelID
          It holds the ID of the channel from which the message was received.
 java.lang.String Data
          The data element of the message that we received , and that generated the event.
 java.lang.String McastPath
          The path of the multicast tree that is traversed till this hop by the message that we received and then generated the event.
 java.lang.String MessageType
          It hold the type of the message that we received.
 java.lang.String MsgSeqNum
          The Sequence Number of the message that we received, as it is numbered by the root-peer of the channel.
static int RECEIVE
          one of the values that action can take
static int SEND
          one of the values that action can take
 java.lang.String sender
          It holds the Peer Name of the peer that sent us the message that generated the event.
 java.lang.String senderId
          It holds the Peer ID of the peer that sent us the message that generated the event.
